title: Facebook user share in the United States 2019 , by gender
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Percentage of users in each Sex on the y axis.
The Percentage of users is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The lowest value at Sex Male is 1.16x times less than the highest value at Female.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Percentage of users in each Sex on the y axis.
The Percentage of users is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Percentage of users in each Sex on the y axis.
The Percentage of users is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The lowest value at Sex Male is 1.16x times less than the highest value at Female.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of users for 2 number of Sexs.
The maximum Percentage of users 53.7 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 46.3.
The lowest value at Sex Male is 1.16x times less than the highest value at Female.
The lowest value 46.3 at Male is almost 1.07 times smaller than the average value 50.0.
Summing up the values of all Sexs, we get total 100.0.
